name: getmaptilewithenglishlabels
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maptiles.
Tool description: Map Tiles for interactive online maps based on data by OpenStreetMap contributors with labels in English, French or Spanish. 
API description: Raster Map Tiles with English Labels. Please see our [tutorials page](https://rapidapi.com/MapTilesApi/api/maptiles/tutorials) on how to use this.
